nodes.text: Movie Frame to Comic Frame: The Genesis of the Star Wars Comic Book!

Movie Frame to Comic Frame: The Genesis of the Star Wars Comic Book! is an Insider article written by J. W. Rinzler. It is a transcript of a meeting, which took place on July 27, 1976, between George Lucas, Lucasfilm marketing and merchandising vice president Charles Lippincott, artist Howard Chaykin, and Marvel Comics editor Roy Thomas about the comic adaptation of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. This article was published in Star Wars Insider 122 and later reprinted in Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2014.
